subject: Sports Injuries
Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The American midfielder Maurice Edu was carried off on a stretcher in the first half of the Glasgow Rangers’ 3-0 loss to visiting Hibernian in the Scottish Premier League.
snippet: The American midfielder Maurice Edu was carried off on a stretcher in the first half of the Glasgow Rangers’ 3-0 loss to visiting Hibernian in the Scottish Premier League.
